item.title: CVE-2024-30453|2024-03-29T16:38:15.281Z -- brave -- brave%20popup%20builder
item.description: Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) vulnerability in Brave Brave Popup Builder.This issue affects Brave Popup Builder: from n/a through 0.6.5.
